verses.verse: But it <S%H7489>displeased<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H7451>exceedingly,<s%> <S%H1419><s%> and he was very <S%H2734>angry.<s%>

And he <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I pray <S%H577>thee,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> my <S%H1697>saying,<s%> when I <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5704>yet<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> my <S%H127>country?<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H6923>before<s%> unto <S%H8659>Tarshish:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art a <S%H2587>gracious<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and <S%H5162>repentest<s%> thee <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3947>take,<s%> I beseech <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me; <S%H3588>for<s%> it is <S%H2896>better<s%> for me to <S%H4194>die<s%> than to <S%H4480>live.<s%> <S%H2416><s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Doest thou <S%H3190>well<s%> to be <S%H2734>angry?<s%>

So <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the east <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6924><s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H5521>booth,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> it in the <S%H6738>shadow,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> he might <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> would <S%H1961>become<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H7021>gourd,<s%> and made it to come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>over<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> that it might <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him from his <S%H4480>grief.<s%> <S%H7451><s%> So <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H8055>was<s%> exceeding <S%H1419>glad<s%> <S%H8057><s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H7021>gourd.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H8438>worm<s%> when the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H5927>rose<s%> the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> and it <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7021>gourd<s%> that it <S%H3001>withered.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> did <S%H2224>arise,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H2759>vehement<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind;<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5221>beat<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> that he <S%H5968>fainted,<s%> and <S%H7592>wished<s%> <S%H854>in<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> to <S%H4191>die,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H2896>better<s%> for me to <S%H4194>die<s%> than to <S%H4480>live.<s%> <S%H2416><s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> Doest thou <S%H3190>well<s%> to be <S%H2734>angry<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H7021>gourd?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I do <S%H3190>well<s%> to be <S%H2734>angry,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H4194>death.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> hast had <S%H2347>pity<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7021>gourd,<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5998>labored,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> madest it <S%H1431>grow;<s%> which came <S%H1961>up<s%> <S%H7945>in<s%> <S%H1121><s%> a <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H6>perished<s%> <S%H1121>in<s%> a night: <S%H3915><s%>

And should <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H3426>are<s%> <S%H7235>more<s%> than sixscore <S%H4480>thousand<s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7239><s%> <S%H120>persons<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3045>discern<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> their right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and their left <S%H8040>hand;<s%> and also <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H929>cattle?<s%>
